title: Errors while availing offers : BookMyShow Support Centre
category: Offers and Winpins : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
I'm experiencing difficulties while applying an offer and encounter the below error. Please help
There is a limited allotment of discounted tickets available under offers with us. These offers on our portal are available to people all across the country.
The offer can be availed on a first come first serve basis. As we have n-number of movies releasing one after the other, the offer gets exhausted within a blink.
Please do try availing the offer on your next transaction.
